author: Melanie Pruitt
text: No truer words ever spoken - Gets wilder by the day!! https://t.co/D8As5iCAMe

author: Melanie Pruitt
text: Your co-stars are great as well, but don’t sell yourself short; you really are one of those rare actors who really does have chemistry w/ everyone you share the screen with! #Days is blessed to have you @DgFeuerriegel! https://t.co/vq8WePiDuA

author: Melanie Pruitt
text: If you have to incessantly repeat AD NAUSEAM how authentic, “real” & “transparent” your support has been from day 1… That aligns more closely with needing to defend false truths, love. #JustSayin

author: Melanie Pruitt
text:
♠️⚡️🙏🏻🥰

With every different season this life brings… each mountain top and every single valley… #Grateful #Thankful & #Blessed to have this one by my side, knowing we both believe in & serve a God bigger & stronger than any temporary struggle we face on this side! https://t.co/lmoEbY3UiY

author: Melanie Pruitt
text: Can’t imagine how empty life would’ve been had our paths never crossed @peaceandlove371! I truly mean every word, you are an MVP & such a blessing to those who are lucky enough to know you! Love you & miss you & I’m wishing you a day truly as AMAZING as YOU!!!! 🥳🎂🎉🎈 https://t.co/q7NkN7zqMB

author: Melanie Pruitt
text: Happiest of Birthdays @peaceandlove371!🥳 @MrRobertScott’s words are 💯🎯;YOU are the MVP & I mean it in every sense! While I’m grateful to have these memories to look back on, I’m even more grateful for the gift of your friendship! Celebrating the amazing soul that is YOU today! https://t.co/bfveFtRJss

author: Melanie Pruitt
text:
⚡️🔥❤️‍🔥🔥⚡️

Ok, THIS @MrRobertScott edit is on 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥!!!! Serious props Jaycee!!!!! 👏🏻👏🏻 https://t.co/fxMQ1CeS9l
